tool_description: The DeBounce email validation and verification API returns JSON data and supports HTTP methods to validate email addresses in real time. DeBounce validates DNS, detects disposable addresses, detects misspelled domains, verifies syntaxes, detects temporary availability, detects graylist, and checks SMTP connection and availability.
title: DeBounce Email Validation

api_list.name: Email
api_list.description: Required parameters of the API Endpoint

required_parameters.name: email
required_parameters.description: The email address you want to verify.
